title: Ranked game having a few connection error.
body: I was playing the ranked game today at night, when was my turn for picking the champion, the connection error caused me couldn't selected the champion and made me lose the Ranked game point that I had own.  Also, sometime when I went to ranked game, it automatic shout down the website.  Don't know what happen for this situation, are there anyways for fixing the connections error?

replies.body:
Connection errors usually indicate that there are problems with your connection between your PC and the server. I strongly advise working from the steps in our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a first step in resolving this issue. 

Let me know if those steps caused any positive change.
